pages.text: You'd almost think this enchantment breathes a little bit of life into your tools.\\Like a living creature, the tool gradually gets used to the block you are mining and specializes in it. In return, however, the mining of other blocks becomes slower.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Decreased mining speed. Speed increases with each block mined of the same type.\\Max Level: 3\Applicable to mining tools.\Mutually exclusive with Efficiency.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Inertia by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Inertia from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and experience for each additional level.
